name: Full Code Press - Wellington
description:
Styles for FullCodePress.com with some of my pics of Wellington. 

If you are going to use this more than once - download the pics and ref them from your hard drive rather than from flickr - as described @ reb.net.nz/blog/css-circus-1.html (look for "Firefox directory" for correct folder locations to use)

Lots of fun :)
